summary: This document appears to be a correspondence from Jeffrey Epstein requesting contact information from recipients after losing his contacts due to a lost Blackberry phone. The tone is casual and informal, indicating a personal communication.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is reaching out to others to request their contact information after losing his phone and contacts.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein lost his Blackberry phone, resulting in the loss of all his contacts.
Epstein is requesting recipients to provide their contact information so he can store it in his new Blackberry.
The correspondence is informal and suggests a personal relationship with the recipients.
